summary: A Django test package that validates the file upload subsystem. It includes tests for directory creation, handling of base64 and large multipart uploads, custom upload handlers that simulate failures and enforce size quotas, security checks on filenames, support for Unicode and RFC2231 encoded names, and proper cleanup of temporary resources. Supporting modules provide the custom handlers and view utilities that simulate various upload scenarios and generate appropriate HTTP responses.
business_intent: To guarantee reliable and secure file upload functionality in a Django application by exhaustively testing edge cases, size limits, encoding handling, and resource management, thereby preventing bugs and security vulnerabilities in production.
